title: Clean HTML
description: Clean HTML content by removing unwanted tags and attributes

unwantedTags.title: Unwanted tags
unwantedTags.description: Array of HTML tag names to remove (default: ['head', 'img', 'script', 'style', 'meta', 'link', 'noscript', 'iframe', 'embed', 'object'])

unwantedAttrs.title: Unwanted attributes
unwantedAttrs.description: Array of HTML attribute names to remove (supports regex patterns like 'data-.*')

detectArticle.title: Extract article content
detectArticle.description: Whether to extract content from <article> tag if present
